summary: ANC Marketplace project with Admin Center that needs authentication guards removed to restore access to role settings and existing data
architectural_notes: Admin Center has existing role settings system for owner/admin assignment
Internet Identity authentication guards implemented in both frontend and backend
Existing deposits and connections must be preserved during security removal
known_issues: Admin Center stuck on 'Connecting to backend...' due to authentication guards blocking access
User principal ID: 2x2kc-7zyj2-widrm-locjk-ulwdv-... cannot access Admin Center

existing_features.title: Remove Internet Identity authentication checks from AdminCenterPage.tsx that are blocking access to the Admin Center interface
Preserve all existing Admin Center functionality including role settings, deposits, financial data, transaction history, and user management features

new_feature_requests.summary: Remove Internet Identity authentication guards blocking Admin Center access (frontend and backend)
Remove authentication/authorization guards from backend Motoko functions that service the Admin Center (admin dashboard data, analytics, transactions, role management)
